mobileResponsivenessTip: Improve mobile responsiveness by optimizing images and ensuring the mobile menu is easier to navigate.
loadingSpeedTip: Optimize image sizes and leverage browser caching to improve loading times.
seoOptimizationTip: Improve SEO by adding more relevant meta descriptions and ensuring proper heading structure (H1, H2, etc.).
userExperienceTip: Make the navigation more intuitive by simplifying the header and improving visibility of key information.
bookingFlowTip: Streamline the booking process by reducing the number of steps and making the forms more user-friendly.
tips: Focus on faster loading times by minimizing large files and scripts.
Ensure that all pages are accessible and mobile-friendly to enhance user experience.
